column5: I am in the market for a new longer rod to target walleyes. Looking at something around 32-36 inches long. Wondering if you guys had any issues fishing with this lenght of rod in a Fishtrap Pro (hitting roof on hookset)? My longest rod so far has been a 28" and had no problems at all.

I have 26's and 28's and hit the roof with both in my fish trap pro and my fish trap scout. I wouldn't  think of using anything longer in my huts. But if you where concious of it and carefull I'm sure there would be no real problems.
